The description may include a summary of the issues or problems, management strategies, outcomes or progress, possible prognosis, and the patientâ€™s understanding of the healthcare event. definition.value: This extension is deprecated because the original purpose of including clinical notes with an Encounter, for example an Event Summary clinical synopsis, is no longer best practice. Future discussion is required to consider an approach for clinical notes, and input is invited on whether this extension is required or currently implemented.
